snippet: As the reaction to the Newtown shooting spreads to corporate America, the battle continues on the Hill, with Representative Carolyn McCarthy on one side, the gun lobby on the other.
abstract: As the reaction to the Newtown shooting spreads to corporate America, the battle continues on the Hill, with Representative Carolyn McCarthy on one side, the gun lobby on the other.

headline.main: TimesCast Politics: Gun Control After Newtown
